suggestions.original: To improve the deformation dimension, consider enhancing the transitions between scenes to create a smoother narrative flow. This could involve using more consistent background elements or visual cues that guide the viewer's eye from one scene to the next. Additionally, further exaggerating the deformations of characters and objects could enhance the whimsical and imaginative aspects of the artwork. For example, the spring shoes and balloons could be made more prominent or exaggerated to emphasize their playful nature. Integrating these elements more cohesively will help in maintaining the viewer's engagement and understanding of the story.
